snippet: Solid earnings by Citigroup and strong improvement in retail sales as winter weather eased led investors to regain some ground lost in the previous week.
abstract: Stock market mounts modest rally, as solid earnings by Citigroup and strong improvement in retail sales led investors to regain some ground lost after rough finish in previous week.
lead_paragraph: Solid earnings by Citigroup and strong improvement in retail sales as winter weather eased led investors to regain some ground lost in the previous week.
